original_title: Teletubbies: Silly Songs and Funny Dances
overview: Dance and sing along with Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po! It's an afternoon full of fun and music in Tubbyland! Join the Teletubbies as they see children dancing ballet and playing the harp! Teletubbies love each other very much!
title: Teletubbies: Silly Songs and Funny Dances
